resources.string: ACTIVITY DESCRIPTION:In this screen the user chooses and activity or mood, each image button launches an activity including a playlist whit the songs tagged whit that mood or activity. IE. If user clics on sports/biking there will be a playlist whit all the "power songs" that stimulates he or she to do exercise

Displays a custom playlist including all songs tagged in this category.Has common media player control.There\'s a list view whit the songs allowing the user to tag a particular song in more than 1 mod/activity
This activity is intended for setting up basic user preferences.Not iplemented yet
